text: Ronny Van Sweevelt (3 August 1962 - 17 June 2020) was a Belgian cyclist. He competed in the individual road race event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. In later life he became addicted to drugs. He was in the news in 2000 after a police chase in Antwerp, after a suspected drug possession. He was sentenced in 2001. Van Sweevelt died in Hasselt on 17 June 2020, after being in a coma which was caused by choking during a meal. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belgian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Belgium Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Hasselt
title: Ronny Van Sweevelt
